product_name: Genuine Innovations Microflate Nano Mini CO2 Inflator
long_description: Lightweight, compact and simple to use, the Genuine Innovations Microflate Nano CO2 inflator is a fast solution for reinflating or topping off your bike tire when it's time to ride.
short_description: Lightweight, compact and simple to use, the Genuine Innovations Microflate Nano CO2 inflator is a fast solution for reinflating or topping off your bike tire when it's time to ride.
